text: [Hiɓe wa'i] wano ɓen adinooɓe on : ɓe laatinoke ɓurɓe on saɗtude doole, ɓurɓe on ɗuuɗude jawle e ɓiɗɓe. Ɓe dakmitori [ontuma] e tagu maɓɓe ngu dakmitorɗon geɓal mon ngal wano adinooɓe on ɓen dakmitornoo geɓal maɓɓe ngal, jumpirɗon wano ɓe jumpirnoo. Ɓen ɗon, golle maɓɓe ɗen poɓii(yirbii) aduna e laakara. Ko ɓen ɗon woni hayruɓe(perdube) ɓen
